doc.title: Hollywood Hustle
doc.plot: Every day hundreds of aspiring artists arrive in Hollywood with nothing more than the clothes on their backs and a gleam in their eye. From the stand up comic cleaning toilets in a youth hostel to the veteran Shakespearean actor working as a bathroom valet to the accomplished TV producer living on the street. These are their sad, sometimes funny but always fascinating stories. Hollywood Hustle is a testament to the sacrifices artists make for their craft.
